title: Custom Art Commission
subtitle: Transform your vision into official artwork created personally for you
importantDescription: To create exactly what you envision personally, you need to have clear specifications so we can deliver to you.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Custom Commission Service
welcome.description1: Do you have a specific vision for a large space or want to own a unique piece of art? Our commission service allows you to collaborate personally with the artist to create an official piece that reflects your personal tastes and preferences in a grand way.
welcome.description2: Whether you want a unique existing artwork or a custom creation, we are here to bring your artistic vision to life.

guarantee.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: We work with you at every stage of the process to ensure the final result meets your expectations

specificationDescription: Please provide the following information so we can create your perfect artwork:

measurements.title: Dimensions and Format
items: Available space where you plan to place the artwork

consultation.title: Initial Consultation
consultation.description: We discuss your vision, tastes and artistic preferences

quote.title: Detailed Quote
quote.description: You receive a custom quote with prices and delivery details

deposit.title: 30% Deposit
deposit.description: Deposit required to begin the creation process and purchase materials

creation.title: Creation Phase
creation.description: The artist creates your artwork while maintaining communication about progress

approval.title: Final Approval
approval.description: You review the completed artwork and give final approval

payment.title: Balance Payment
payment.description: You pay the remaining 70% of the balance before shipping

shipping.title: Packaging and Shipping
shipping.description: Your artwork is professionally packaged and carefully shipped

points.secure: Securing your spot in the artist's schedule
Security for both parties is ensured

guarantee.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: If you're not satisfied with the result, we offer revisions or partial refund during the creation process

delivery.title: Delivery Options
delivery.description: Delivery times vary depending on the artwork:

standard.title: International Delivery
standard.time: 2-4 weeks depending on technique and distance

q1.question: Can I request changes during the process?
q1.answer: Yes, in the early stages, you can request changes. As the work progresses, major changes may incur additional costs.

q2.question: What happens if I don't like the final result?
q2.answer: We work with you throughout the process to ensure your satisfaction. If you're not satisfied at the end, we offer revision options or partial refund during the artwork development.

q3.question: Are framing and shipping included in the price?
q3.answer: The base price includes the completed artwork. Framing and shipping are calculated separately based on your specific preferences.

cta.title: Ready to start your project?
cta.description: Contact us today to discuss your artistic vision
